alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:52PM CDT until June 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Denton, or 7 miles southwest of Troy, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atchison, Rushville, Lancaster, Denton, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Severance, Huron, Leona, Iatan, Faucett, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi and Bendena. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 36 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
